attributes.action: Link MPs' pay at all grades to an equivalent civil service grade currently at the same pay grade.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently MPs vote for their own pay rise. This is seen by most workers, and I suspect some MPs, as not being a fair way for setting of their pay rates. If the MPs' pay, including ministers, cabinet members and the prime minister, were directly linked to an equivalent civil service pay grade then this would be considerd to be fair and not put MPs in a difficult position regarding the setting of their pay.
